Html: In the Item Budget display of Rawr.Mage, it lists most things as 10 of an item - 10 Int, 10 Spell Haste, 10 Spirit, etc.  But Spell Damage is listed as 11.7.  Wouldn't it be more useful to set this to 12, since the Epic gems have 12 Spell Damage on them?
If you want to compare gems, compare gems. If you want to compare item budget, compare item budget. The item budget ratio for spell damage is 11.7.
